name: The Last Sorcerer (itch)
description: Take on the role of a great wizard who is the last sorcerer in the world. Only townsfolk nearby have heard the news of your presence, so to keep them quiet, you've agreed to grant some of their wishes. In this game, you decide which spells to cast or not cast for the people of the town. Your decisions will impact the future of the people and their town, Choose wisely.
